Package com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features

Features specific to the tokenisation phase.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TokenAddressFunction<T>
    A function that, given a reference token, can return another token.
    TokenFeature<Y>
    A feature which tests a Token, ignoring any context (e.g.
    TokeniserContextFeature<Y>
    A tokeniser feature which takes the history of current decisions into account.
    TokenPatternMatchFeature<Y>
    A feature which tests a TokenPatternMatch during tokenising.
    TokenWrapper
    A simple wrapper for a token, useful to allow multiple feature contexts to act all as a TokenWrapper for Token features.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTokenAddressFunction  
    AbstractTokenFeature<Y>
    An Abstract base class for intrinsic features.
    AbstractTokeniserContextFeature<Y>  
    AndRangeFeature
    Tests all tokens within a certain range for a certain criterion, and returns true only if all of them satisfy the criterion.
    Start and end are absolute indexes.
    If either refer to a postion outside of the token sequence, will test all valid tokens only.
    If no tokens are tested, will return null.
    If any test returns null, will return null.
    BackwardSearchFeature
    Returns the first token preceding this one which matches a certain criterion, or null if no such token is found.
    The user may optionally provide absolute indexes to limit the search.
    CountIfFeature
    Counts the tokens within a certain range matching a certain criterion.
    The range is given in absolute indexes.
    If start > end, returns null.
    If no end is provided, assumes it should go till end of sentence.
    FirstWordInCompoundFeature
    Returns the first word in a compound token.
    FirstWordInSentenceFeature
    Returns true if this is the first word in the sentence.
    Will skip initial punctuation (e.g.
    ForwardSearchFeature
    Returns the first token following this one which matches a certain criterion, or null if no such token is found.
    The user may optionally provide absolute indexes to limit the search.
    HasClosedClassesOnlyFeature
    Returns true if all of this tokens classes in the lexicon are closed, false otherwise.
    HasFeature
    Returns true if the token refered to by address meets the boolean criterion.
    IfThenElseTokenAddressFeature  
    InsidePatternNgramFeature
    Gives the previous tokeniser decision for the atomic token just preceding the one indicated by a given index in the given pattern.
    Useful for ensuring that inner-pattern decisions are always respected (unless two patterns overlap in the same sequence), thus ensuring that multi-token compound words are either made compound as a whole, or not at all.
    LastWordInCompoundFeature
    Retrieves the last word in a compound token.
    LastWordInSentenceFeature
    Returns true if this is the last word in the sentence (including punctuation).
    LemmaForPosTagFeature
    The "best" lemma of a given token and postag (or set of postags), as supplied by the lexicon.
    LexiconAllPosTagsFeature
    Returns a comma-separated concatenated string of all lexicon pos-tags for this token.
    LexiconPosTagFeature
    Returns true if the token has a lexical entry for any one of the PosTags provided.
    LexiconPosTagForStringFeature
    Returns true if the string provided has a lexicon entry for the PosTag provided.
    LexiconPosTagsFeature
    A StringCollectionFeature returning all of the postags for the current token in the lexicon.
    LexiconPosTagsForStringFeature
    A StringCollectionFeature returning all of the postags in the lexicon for a word specified by the wordToCheckFeature.
    NLetterPrefixFeature
    Retrieves the first N letters of the first entire word in the present token, as long as N < the length of the first entire word.
    NLetterSuffixFeature
    Retrieves the last N letters of the last entire word in the current token, as long as N < the length of the last word.
    OrRangeFeature
    Tests all tokens within a certain range for a certain criterion, and returns true if any one of them satisfies the criterion.
    Start and end are absolute indexes.
    If either refer to a postion outside of the token sequence, will test all valid tokens only.
    If no tokens are tested, will return null.
    If any test returns null, will return null.
    PatternGroupNameFeature
    The current pattern's group name.
    PatternIndexInSentenceFeature
    Returns the index of the first token matching this pattern.
    PatternMatchIndexInSentenceFeature
    Returns the index of the first token matching this pattern.
    PatternMatchOffsetAddressFunction
    Returns a token offset from the TokeniserPattern containing the present token.
    This allows us to find the word preceding a given compound candidate, or following a given compound candidate.
    Returns null if the offset goes outside the token sequence.
    PatternMatchWordFormFeature
    Returns the actual text of the tokens matching the current pattern.
    PatternNameFeature
    The current pattern's name.
    PatternOffsetAddressFunction
    Returns a token offset from the TokeniserPattern containing the present token.
    This allows us to find the word preceding a given compound candidate, or following a given compound candidate.
    Returns null if the offset goes outside the token sequence.
    PatternWordFormFeature
    Returns the actual text of the tokens matching the current pattern.
    PosTagSetFeature
    A StringCollectionFeature returning all of the postags in the current postagset.
    RegexFeature
    Returns true if the token matches a given regular expression.
    TokenAtAddressFunction
    Returns a token at a given absolute index, or null if the index is out of sentence range.
    TokenFeatureParser
    A helper class for adding generic token features to any parser requiring them.
    TokenIndexFeature
    Returns the current token's index.
    TokeniserContext
    A tokeniser context, which includes the current token and the analysis history.
    TokeniserContextFeatureParser  
    TokeniserPatternsAndIndexesFeature
    A StringCollectionFeature returning all of the patterns in which the current token is not in position 0.
    TokeniserPatternsFeature
    A StringCollectionFeature returning all of the patterns started by the current token.
    TokenOffsetAddressFunction
    Returns a token offset from the current token by a certain offset.
    Returns null if the offset goes outside the token sequence.
    TokenPatternMatchFeatureParser  
    UnknownWordFeature
    Returns true if the token is unknown in the lexicon.
    WordFeature
    Returns true if token word is any one of the words provided.
    WordFormFeature
    Simply returns the current token's text.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features Description

Features specific to the tokenisation phase.
